name: @kathondvla/sri4node-audit-broadcast
description: A module for sri4node to register sri-audit-broadcast messages.
author: Katholiek Onderwijs Vlaanderen

scripts.test: docker compose -f test/docker/docker-compose.yml down --remove-orphans --rmi=local && docker compose -f test/docker/docker-compose.yml up --wait postgres && docker compose -f test/docker/docker-compose.yml logs && mocha
